features: MASCULINE SCENT SOAP: Rejuvenate your face, mind, body, and soul as Age of Sage lets you feel an excellent bathing experience with its Handmade Masculine Scent Bath Soaps. Each bar offers a unique manly fragrance that brings true satisfaction straight to your home.

REGAL INDULGENCE: Treat your man like royalty with our 4-piece vegan soap bar care package. Crafted with natural ingredients like olive oil, shea butter, and essential oils, it delivers a luxurious and heavenly scent. Elevate his shower routine with this ideal gift for him. Leave him feeling fresh, clean, and smelling like a king. Ideal for any special occasion.

SUPERB GIFTS IDEAS: 4 individually wrapped bars in a classic box, just add a ribbon and it's ready to go as a gift. Every dad or a husband would love this as a Fathers Day gift for men. You can also have this on Mothers Day, Birthday, Christmas, New Year's, Thanks Giving, House Warming or a just-because pampering items to make the special person of your life feel relaxed after a long day of work.

COLD PRESSED ARTISAN SOAP: Stay fresh and find pleasure with our Eucalyptus Aloe, Nag Champa, Sandalwood Rose and Cedarwood Tea Tree scented Cold Pressed Artisan Soap. We employ the cold process soap making method mixed by hand in small batches to ensure the quality of the product.

ALL-NATURAL BODY SOAP BAR: Our Bath Soaps collection are infused with all-organic ingredients, including Coconut Oil, Canola Oil, Soybean Oil, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye) Olive Pomace Oil, Sunflower Oil, Fragrance. This is nature in a bar!

Utilizing The Power of Nature In Every Bar of Soap Find pleasure in every handcrafted bar of our unique and richly scented natural soaps. We combine the powerful blends of essential oils, herbs, and flowers to create a one-of-a-kind aroma that will wash away your stresses after a long day. We believe in the power of self-care and want to help you live a more balanced life. Our mild-scented soap nourishes your body and provides rejuvenating moisture for softer, plumper skin all day.

Superb Gift Idea Four of our individually wrapped soap bars are presented in a classic box - all you need to do is add a ribbon and it's ready to go as practical gift. 100% Natural Ingredients Made with all-natural, organic ingredients including Coconut Oil, Canola Oil, Soybean Oil, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), and more. Cold Process Soapmaking Our artisanal soaps are mixed and custom-made with premium ingredients. We expertly handcraft each soap down to the luxurious scents and color story. Variety of Soap Scents Stay fresh and find pleasure with Age of Sage in a variety of men's and women's scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So fresh omg
reviews.reviewText: I have to start off this review by letting y’all know I was searching for the perfect bar soap that wouldn’t leave me dry, or smelling odd, or broken out. This soap works wonders. First off, the scents are so lovely, I had to choose which one to use first because they all smell so good! Very sweet and fruity scents, and very nice on the skin. I have sensitive skin and eczema, and this soap has not aggravated my skin upon usage at all. The packaging is very simple and discreet, and the bars of soap themselves are of great quality with no chipping or stripping. I will be buying again. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap...my second order. It lathers well and rinses off easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than the average store-bought bath soaps, but not as good as others that I've tried.
reviews.reviewText: Don't get me wrong, this is good soap, much better than your average store-bought bath soaps, but it falls a little short of having the same qualities as some of the triple milled French bath soaps that I've tried, 5 stars for the fragrance, 5 stars for longevity, 3 stars for the suds. Would I buy this soap again, YES, however I do have other preferences, I would recommend giving it a try because no two people are alike, and no two people have the same preferences. I do believe that it is a worth-while purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and lathers really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: See the picture. Definitely 'artisinal'. Presented in a plain white box, different sized soaps, look like they were made, labeled, and packaged in someone's garage. (VERY glad I didn't send it as a gift.) Fragrances are light and don't stay on the skin, but they do smell great while showering. Rinses completely clean and does moisturize. However, dollar-for-dollar, Bali soaps were just as good for a lesser price, with consistent sizing, consumer packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loves it!
reviews.reviewText: Thus was a gift and she loves the scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars F******** love these
reviews.reviewText: These soaps are so nice 😭 my hands were at a mid life crisis cracking and they saved them from bath and bodywork’s. I just wish they weren’t so expensive.
